Calling all seekers, leaders, doers and dreamers.
At BW, belonging means more. Relationships are at the heart of our community.
Real-world focused with an arts and sciences core, a BW education is tailored to you.
A top-ranked education at an exceptional value
Earn your degree faster and save money — guaranteed!
90% of BW graduates are employed or in grad school within 6 months
Living on campus is one of the best ways for students to fully immerse themselves in the college experience.

As a BW student, you will achieve personal and professional growth in a supportive community that inspires and challenges, so that you may thrive in a changing world.

Whether you are just beginning your college education, or have some credits under your belt, BW will challenge you to question, discover and lead — and place you on the way to achieving your ambitions and dreams. The path for first-time, transfer and degree completion students starts here.

Your goal is to continue your education and move to the next level. Baldwin Wallace is here to help you take that next step. BW offers graduate degrees in business, education, physician assistant and speech-language pathology. BW also has post-baccalaureate programs in nursing, music therapy and teacher licensure.
